text:
No more pillow talk. Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik are going their separate ways after dating for seven months. Us Weekly Video takes a look back at their short-lived romance — from their adorable social media snaps to their head-turning red carpet debut. Grab a tissue and take a walk down memory lane with the video above.

The Victoria’s Secret model, 21, and Malik, 23, first sparked dating rumors last November. The pair rarely spoke about their relationship publicly but didn’t hide it either. Some of their more memorable moments together include a sexy May fashion spread in Vogue and a cameo from Hadid in Zayn’s “Pillowtalk” music video. (Cue the makeout session!)

More recently, the young stars coordinated in Tommy Hilfiger outfits at the Metropolitan Museum of Art’s Costume Institute Gala in NYC in May. The lovebirds abided by the futuristic theme: “Manus x Machina: Fashion in an Age of Technology.”

Hadid and Malik have yet to comment on their breakup. Hadid last posted about the hunky Brit when she posted a throwback selfie of the two on May 20. “Missing you,” she wrote.

For more on the exes, watch the video above to relive their sweetest moments!
title: Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik Split: Look Back at Their Relationship
